headline: Did Salesforce’s (CRM) AI Agent Push and Job Cuts Just Recast Its Automation-Driven Investment Narrative?
summary: In recent weeks, GoDaddy, REI Systems, and Asymbl have each announced new AI agent integrations and applications built on Salesforce platforms, while Salesforce itself cut nearly 1,000 jobs as it deepens its investment in artificial intelligence. Together, these moves highlight Salesforce’s push to make AI agents core to its ecosystem, enhancing governance, security, and workforce orchestration, even as that same automation begins to displace human roles. We’ll now examine how Salesforce’s...

headline: A Look At GoDaddy (GDDY) Valuation After MuleSoft AI Agent Identity Partnership
summary: GoDaddy’s AI agent identity push and recent stock move GoDaddy (GDDY) recently announced that its Agent Name Service is integrating with Salesforce's MuleSoft Agent Fabric, giving enterprises a way to register, verify, and control AI agents that touch core systems and data. This AI security focus arrived as GoDaddy shares climbed 3.48% in mid-day trading on February 20, drawing fresh attention from analysts and raising questions about how much of the story is already reflected in the current...

headline: Big Salesforce Price Target Cuts Ahead of Q4 Earnings
summary: With Salesforce’s (NYSE: CRM) Q4 FY2026 earnings due February 25, three major Wall Street firms slashed their price targets on the stock Monday morning, raising a pointed question for investors: is it a stock that’s dangerous to overlook, or simply dangerous to own? headline: Dystopian AI report sinks payment and software stocks
summary: Investing.com -- DoorDash shares fell 7% on Monday, while Uber dropped 3%, Salesforce declined 5%, MongoDB and AppLovin slid 8%, and ServiceNow lost 4%, following publication of a dystopian scenario analysis from Citrini Research examining potential risks from rapid AI advancement. Visa, Mastercard and American Express also declined, falling over 4%.

content.title: Dystopian AI report sinks payment and software stocks
content.summary: Investing.com -- DoorDash shares fell 7% on Monday, while Uber dropped 3%, Salesforce declined 5%, MongoDB and AppLovin slid 8%, and ServiceNow lost 4%, following publication of a dystopian scenario analysis from Citrini Research examining potential risks from rapid AI advancement. Visa, Mastercard and American Express also declined, falling over 4%.
